title: Chronic Heart Disease Management and Smartphone-Based Patient Education Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental knowledge of cardiovascular diseases and basic smartphone usage skills
context.additional_context: Customized educational environment for employees, with a flexible schedule enabling learning outside of work hours.

learning_goals: Learners can accurately describe symptom management and prevention strategies for chronic heart disease with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can record daily health data using smartphone applications with 90% accuracy.
Learners can successfully perform emergency response procedures three consecutive times in a simulation environment.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
